class_notes:
(As the entertainment industry develops new best practices for these challenging times, audition protocols are shifting as well. It is now more important than ever to understand how to put oneself 'on tape', even for theater auditions. This class will focus on preparing monologues and scenes for self-taped theater auditions from an acting perspective, as well as the practical aspects of what makes an audition tape work. A one-credit, six week course offered the first half of the semester.)
Request Permission: https://mejordan.wufoo.com/forms/xbz9fum0b9cfmn/)
course_description: Individual courses on special topics in theater at the 200-level. This course may be repeated.
